detailed_profile.about: I am an informal and like to mix my fun and work! I have transited through the following functions during the past 25 years in the industry: Sales / Risk / Credit / Collections / Legal / HRD / Treasury, before finally settling in as CFO. My last role was that of Group Business Head. Previously, I have held senior positions including that of National Risk & Credit Head and Head-Fee-based Business. Further information on me and the management team can be found on our website www.magma.co.in

experience.title: Associate Vice President-HR and Projects
experience.description: Accountability: - Developed business HR strategy for the organization and HR deliverable towards staff    productivity.- Developed implementation strategy on organization culture change process. - Developed and implemented business hr deliverable s,Business HR KPI,Hr score card and HR   MIS on key talent retention and diversity.- Developed and implemented behavioral risk matrix for the organization.- Managed business Hr process implementation across geographical regions for assigned sales   channels and aligned sales objective towards business profitability.- Enhancing people's reach to HR by developing structured dialogue processes and co-ordination   within Branch Heads, Regional Heads and Zonal Heads through employee communication   process on attrition, productivity and feedback.- Executing performance appraisal system, confirmation and assessment processes, staff   satisfaction surveys and HR surveys at all levels.- Overseeing staff relation within 416 branches across India and driving unit productivity & creating   awareness on business loss through Business HR branch visit model.- Devising strategies on various aspects of Performance measurement criteria in need with the   management.- Responsible for analysis of new project management, man power analysis, infrastructure   management at all levels, branch management and administration.- Looking after talent management and man power budgeting across regions and verticals and   recruitment process at all levels within the organization including senior management positions.
experience.description_html:
Accountability:
- Developed business HR strategy for the organization and HR deliverable towards staff
productivity.
- Developed implementation strategy on organization culture change process.
- Developed and implemented business hr deliverable s,Business HR KPI,Hr score card and HR
MIS on key talent retention and diversity.
- Developed and implemented behavioral risk matrix for the organization.

channels and aligned sales objective towards business profitability.

within Branch Heads, Regional Heads and Zonal Heads through employee communication
process on attrition, productivity and feedback.

satisfaction surveys and HR surveys at all levels.

awareness on business loss through Business HR branch visit model.
- Devising strategies on various aspects of Performance measurement criteria in need with the
management.
- Responsible for analysis of new project management, man power analysis, infrastructure
management at all levels, branch management and administration.
- Looking after talent management and man power budgeting across regions and verticals and
recruitment process at all levels within the organization including senior management positions.

detailed_profile.name: Ramasubramanian B
detailed_profile.position: Zonal Collection Head @ Magma Fincorp Ltd. | LLB
detailed_profile.about: With over 23 years of experience in the banking sector, I am a BFSI expert and a zonal collection head at Magma Fincorp, a leading non-banking financial company in India. I have an in-depth understanding of collection operations, legal and recovery processes, credit administration, and portfolio management. I lead and manage large teams of risk officers, collection agents, and legal professionals to ensure timely and effective recovery of outstanding payments from clients across different delinquency buckets. I also devise and implement strategies to improve collections, reduce bad debts, and enhance customer retention and satisfaction. I have successfully established and streamlined new setups, created and managed MIS reports, and assessed and mitigated risks. I am a certified execution leader from IIM Ahmedabad and a law graduate from Vijayaragava College of Law.

projects.title: Study on Financial leverage of 30 SENSEX Companies
projects.description: In the whole project, I have detailed the financial leverage, and revealed that how it is beneficial for the company. SENSEX 30 is being taken so that we can understood that how Financial leverage works in the Indian market.How it affects the return on investment and how important it is to be an successful entrepreneur. Calculation done in the chapters shows the significance and utility of the degree of financial leverage. It has better understood by the cause and effect method .if there is an effect on the firms profitability or firm‚Äôs growth then there must be a cause. and the cause is described in the data analysis unit ,where graphs shows the degree of financial leverage, debt to equity ratio and interest cover and how it helps in forecasting firm‚Äôs future.

detailed_profile.name: Kailash Baheti
detailed_profile.position: Chief Strategy Officer, Ambuja Neotia Group, Kolkata, Ex-Group CFO, Magma Fincorp Limited, Ex-CEO, Century Extrusions Limited
detailed_profile.about: My working career has been with 2 groups or in 2 parts ‚Äì first in Manufacturing industry, from 1988 to 2011 for a greenfield engineering Company, and second in Services industry, from 2011 to 2021 for a group comprising of a NBFC, a HFC and a General Insurance Company. Started my career as Finance Manager and Co. Secretary for an engineering company, moved to the position of CFO and eventually CEO of the Company. Moved to financial services industry in 2011 as Group Chief Strategy Officer, and subsequently took up the responsibility of Group CFO in 2016 and continued until July 2021. The 1st part of working career provided opportunities to create a manufacturing unit from scratch, handle issues at shop floor level incl. dealing with workmen, with customers and handle all varieties of issues for a manufacturing organization. The 2nd part of working career provided opportunities of acquiring a housing finance company from G E Money, working as part of the launch team of General Insurance Company, and challenges of navigating the group through the crisis in NBFC industry between Sep 2018 to Sep 2019, and then through the COVID pandemic since Mar 2020. Have closely observed and implemented migration of financial accounting from IGAAP to Ind AS, evolution of Direct and Indirect Taxation, evolution of transparency and corporate governance and have excellent understanding of each of these subjects. Handled several rounds of capital raise, by way of IPO and follow-on issues in 1990s to raising large capital - from PE investors in 2015 (Rs. 500 Cr), by a QIP issue in 2018 (Rs. 500 Cr) and inducting new promoter (Poonawalla group, Capital raise of Rs. 3,456 Cr) in 2021. Worked very closely with 5 marquee large PE investors over last 10 years apart from dealing with many other PE and Institutional investors as part of capital raise and investor relations portfolio. Dealt with almost all the large Public and Private Sector banks, Multilateral Institutions, Mutual Funds, Large Legal firms, Big 4 CA firms, Large Investment Banks, Rating Agencies, ARCs, etc. Served as Director on Board of Magma Housing as nominee of Magma Fincorp from Feb 2013 to June 2020. Represented Magma Fincorp, at all Board meetings of Magma HDI General Insurance Company Ltd from May 2012 to July 2018. A matter of pride for Magma‚Äôs Corporate Governance team came in 2019, when an Independent Investor Advisory firm assessed Magma against NIFTY100 Companies and found Magma‚Äôs governance at 80 percentiles, i.e., 20th best (Magma was near 500th rank in capitalization in 2019).

positions.title: Credit Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Proven acumen in executing core responsibilities, such as Credit Appraisals, Credit Monitoring, Risk Assessment and Portfolio Monitoring.
• Ensuring desired TAT level in file process by closely adhering to policy
• Adept in appraising credit proposals & scrutinizing relevant documents before sanctioning / disbursing the credit, ensuring compliance with organizational credit policies.
• Expertise in conducting analysis to assess prevalent market environment, identifying business risks & implementing effective mechanisms to mitigate the same.
• Excellent relationship management skills capable of combining strong business acumen with the ability to conceive profitable and efficient business solutions.
• Regular monthly field visits for market knowledge and portfolio analysis.
